metadata.title: CVE-2014-9447 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the read_long_names function inlibelf/elf_begin.c in elfutils 0.152 and 0.161 allows remote attackers towrite to arbitrary files to the root directory via a / (slash) in a craftedarchive, as demonstrated using the ar program.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9447` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libasm1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libdw1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
libelf1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.158-0ubuntu5.2').
